description:
SSC forces attack the otaku at the Wanku! event with an army led by two of the Four Heavenly Kings—the silent Himawari and her overbearing older brother. Pink and Blue have to take the power-up drugs from Chogo-shi to defend against the deadly siblings.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Déferlante de frère et sœur relou
やべぇ兄妹が押し寄せる
